name: places/ChIJ2VW2hNNZwokRE4E6RHvzjH8
formattedAddress: 328 E 53rd St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 328 E 53rd St, New York, NY 10022-5219, USA

originalText.text: Came here today for a much needed green tea spa pedicure. Super sweet ladies, very welcoming. Pedicure includes callus remover and 10 minute foot massage. With 20% discount on the first service, it’s about the same price as a regular pedicure with 10 minutes of reflexology so I figured why not.  The callus remover got rid of a lot of rough spots, but not absolutely everything. Aria is a sunny, large space with a skylight. Nice and cool inside. The ladies were super nice and Jamie who did my nails was adorable and so gracious. The quick back massage while my toes dried was great. I would definitely come back here.

originalText.text:
This is my new go to spot! I had such a great experience. I walked in randomly and was able to be serviced. I got a pedicure and nail extensions. I was indecisive with the color, style and Aria helped me get exactly what I wanted. She was so diligent and attentive.
The place is clean, elegant and cater to your needs.

text.text:

The place is clean, elegant and cater to your needs.

originalText.text:
I passed by this nail salon as it just recently opened and I'm so happy I stopped by. It's a new shop so everything is modern and I was surprised by how big the store is as you go inside. They have so many manicure chairs and a big space in the back for pedicures, 2 rooms for waxing, and a massage room. I did French gel tips and she fixed one of my broken nails with a silk wrap.

5/5 cleanliness
5/5 service
5/5 nails!!!

Fran did my nails and she is the shop owner! She did a beautiful job and took about 30 minutes. It was not rushed at all-- she is just so good at what she does :) this is her 2nd shop so she must be doing something right! Please come visit her new shop, she really deserves the support and love! Really a beautiful high quality nail salon so I cant wait to come back to try a mani pedi!

originalText.text: Came across this new nail salon and got a gel manicure by Fran. She was very lovely and passionate about her work. Love the way my nails came out! The place is very clean and vibrant with a very relaxing atmosphere. It feels like an escape from the city! They offer many different services from nails to spas, massages, waxes, and more. Will definitely be coming back!

text.text: Came across this new nail salon and got a gel manicure by Fran. She was very lovely and passionate about her work. Love the way my nails came out! Will definitely be coming back!

originalText.text: Just had such a great experience at Aria! I got their Silk Milk and Honey Spa Pedicure and it was amazing!!!!! The most thorough and relaxing pedicure I’ve ever gotten - it also includes a callus removal and an incredible 10 min massage. The staff was so sweet, making sure I was comfortable and pampered. I was given a blanket during my pedicure and asked several times if everything was okay and if I was comfortable. The interior of the salon is so cute and clean. 10/10 reccomend. They’re also on Classpass which is such a huge bonus.
